flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=600>>600 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=172>>172 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $600 - $150 = $<<600-150=450>>450 per head.
He would make $450 x 172 = $<<450*172=77400>>77400 at the lowered price.
He could have made $600 x 172 = $<<600*172=103200>>103200 at the original price.
He would lose $103200 - $77400 = $<<103200-77400=25800>>25800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 168, not 172. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
